name: UNINHABITABLE (INNEROM)
description:
(WARNING)

this is early early EARLY access don't exepect a whole heap of content

Showcase level contains spoilers for the story of the game

(Future plans?)

I'm planing on adding a intro cutscene ending cutscene actual game play a monster who chases you around and a few puzzles as well as some other little things

(Future goal for the game?)

goal of the game is going to be where you accidentally land on a mysterious planet that is "Uninhabitable" and you have to find all five pieces to fix you're rocket ship and get the heck outta there all while being hunted down by a alien monster! as of now you can only explore the map and click a white cube which replicates the collection of parts you need for you're rocket ship
